mapper.select: SELECT u.account,u.avatar,r.id,r.vid,r.uid,r.content,r.time,v.title FROM t_user u,t_review r,t_video v WHERE u.id = r.uid AND v.id = r.vid AND r.vid = #{vid} AND r.state = 'review_pass'
SELECT u.account,u.avatar,r.id,r.vid,r.uid,r.content,r.time,v.title FROM t_user u,t_review r,t_video v WHERE u.id = r.uid AND v.id = r.vid AND r.state = 'review_commit'
mapper.update: update t_review set state = #{state} where id = #{id}
